query.name: Gene_Pathway
query.longDescription:
Query pathways from genes.
Users of this product/service may not download large quantities of KEGG Data.

query.name: Drug_Protein
query.longDescription: Given a drug compound or a list of drug compounds, find all target proteins.

query.name: TF_DownstreamGene
query.longDescription: Given a transcription factor or a list of transcription factors, retrieve all downstream targeted genes compiled by the public resources (AMADEUS, ORegAnno and HtriDB).

query.name: Gene_Compound
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find the compounds which target the gene products (proteins).

query.name: Gene_UpstreamTF
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all upstream regulatory genes (transcription factors) compiled by the the public resources (AMADEUS, ORegAnno and HtriDB).

template.name: Gene_BnHub_Compound
template.title: Gene list --> Compounds that target hub or bottleneck genes

query.name: Gene_BnHub_Compound
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.name Gene.networkProperties.isBottleneck Gene.networkProperties.isHub Gene.proteins.compounds.compound.compoundGroup.name
query.longDescription: Given a list of gene, find compounds which target the hub or the bottleneck genes in the interactome.

query.name: Compound_Bioactivity
query.longDescription: Given a compound or a list of compounds, show the target proteins and the known bioactivities (IC50, Kd and Ki by the unit nM).

query.name: Gene_IPC
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.name Gene.integratedPathwayClusters.identifier Gene.integratedPathwayClusters.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find all associated Integrated Pathway Clusters(IPCs).

query.name: Protein_Pathway
query.longDescription:
Query pathways from proteins.
Users of this product/service may not download large quantities of KEGG Data.

template.name: Gene_NetworkProperties
template.title: Gene(s) --> PPI Network properties (Bottleneck and Hub)

query.name: Gene_NetworkProperties
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, show wether it is a the bottlenecks or a hub in the species specific high-confidence protein interactome

query.name: Protein_Compound
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.organism.name Protein.compounds.compound.identifier Protein.compounds.compound.name Protein.compounds.dataSet.name
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, find all known compounds which interact with the protein(s).

query.name: Gene_Tissue
query.longDescription: Given a gen or a list of genes, show the tissues which express the gene(s) in a specific microarray platform.

query.name: Protein_Drug
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, show all the drug compounds in DrugBank which target the protein.

query.name: MiRNA_Gene
query.longDescription: Given a miRNA or a list of miRNA, find all the targeting genes including those with weak evidence. (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: ATC_DrugCompound
query.longDescription:
Given an ATC code, find all drug compounds (from DrugBank or KEGG Drug) assigned with this classification.
NOTE: Use asterisk symbol (*) for the higher level code (see the example).

query.name: Tissue_Gene
query.longDescription: Given a tissue or a list of tissues, show the genes expressed in the tissue(s) of a specific microarray platform.

query.name: MiRNA_Func_MTI
query.longDescription: Given a miRNA or a list of miRNA, find all the functional targeting genes excluding those with weak evidence. (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: Gene_Disease
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, identify all the diseases which they are associated with.

query.name: Protein_CompoundGroup
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, show all the compounds which target the protein.

query.name: Drug_Protein_Structure
query.longDescription: Given a drug, find the target proteins which contain 3D structures.

query.name: Enzyme_Pathway
query.longDescription:
Query pathways by enzyme. (It is unnecessary to specify the organism.)
Users of this product/service may not download large quantities of KEGG Data

template.name: Gene_Intermediate_Interaction
template.title: Gene A --> Gene X --> Gene B

query.name: Gene_Intermediate_Interaction
query.longDescription: Given a pair of genes, find all the genes (Gene X) the products of which physically interact with those of Gene A and Gene B.

template.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Physical_Species_Spec
template.title: Gene list --> Species specific BIOGRID and iRefIndex PHYSICAL Interactions

query.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Physical_Species_Spec
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Give a list of genes, retrieve all physical interactions from the BIOGRID and iRefIndex database for specific species
query.constraintLogic: A and (C or D) and (E or F) and B and G

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

query.name: GO_Parent_Gene
query.view: Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given a Gene ontology(GO) term, find all genes which are annotated with this GO term or its child terms. You can edit the template to remove the non-IEA constraint if you want all annotations.

query.name: Drug_ATCCodes
query.longDescription: Given a drug or a list of drugs, retrieve the corresponding Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) codes.

template.name: MiRNA_Gene_HC
template.title: miRNA --> High confidence functional miRNA target genes

query.name: MiRNA_Gene_HC
query.longDescription: Given a miRNA or a list of miRNA, retrieve all high confidence functional miRNA-target gene interactions (MTIs). (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: Gene_MiRNA
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find the miRNAs which target the gene(s), including those with week evidence. (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: Protein_ProteinDomainAll
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.proteinDomainRegions.originalDb Protein.proteinDomainRegions.originalId Protein.proteinDomainRegions.start Protein.proteinDomainRegions.end Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.name
query.longDescription: For given protein(s), list all domain annotations.

query.name: ChEMBL_Protein_Activity
query.longDescription: Given a ChEMBL compound and a target protein show the known bioactivities (IC50, Kd and Ki by the unit nM).

query.name: Gene-bottleneck
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve the bottlenecks in the species specific high-confidence protein interactome

template.name: Gene_HCDP_Interaction
template.title: Gene(s) --> High confidence direct physical (HCDP) PPIs

query.name: Gene_HCDP_Interaction
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find all high confidence direct physical interacting partners (within the same species).

template.name: IntraSet_HCDP
template.title: Gene list --> Intra-set High confidence direct physical (HCDP) Interactions

query.name: IntraSet_HCDP
query.longDescription: Give a list of genes, retrieve all high confidence direct physical(HCDP) interactions within the list.

query.name: TF_Gene_Both
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all upstream regulators (regulatory transcription factors) and/or downstream targets compiled by the the public resources (AMADEUS, ORegAnno and HtriDB).

query.name: Network_topology
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, show whether it is a bottleneck or a hub in the species specific high-confidence protein interactome

query.name: Drug_Protein_wo_substrate
query.longDescription: Given a drug or a list of drugs, find all target proteins reported in DrugBank excluding those acted as the 'substrate'.

query.name: Gene_RelationType_Source
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.text Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes and the relation type, find all upstream genes and the source pathways. (to be refined)

query.name: Gene_Enzyme
query.longDescription: Find enzymes from a gene or a gene list.

template.name: Kinase_Substrate_Modification
template.title: Kinase Gene --> Substrate and the phosphorylation sites

query.name: Kinase_Substrate_Modification
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.text Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name Gene.relations.modifications.protein.primaryAccession Gene.relations.modifications.position Gene.relations.modifications.residue
query.longDescription: Given a kinase gene or a list of kinase genes, find all substrate genes and the phosphorylation sites.

query.name: Protein_Compounds_Assay
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.organism.name Protein.compounds.compound.identifier Protein.compounds.compound.name Protein.compounds.dataSet.name Protein.compounds.activities.assay.identifier Protein.compounds.activities.assay.name
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, show the compounds which target the protein(s) and their assay from ChEMBL and PubChem BioAssay.

query.name: ProbeSet_Gene
query.longDescription: Given a probe set or a list of probe sets, find the corresponding genes

query.name: Gene_BioGrid_All
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.gene2.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.details.type
query.longDescription: Give a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all interactions from the BIOGRID database. May contain cross species interactions.

template.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Physical_Both
template.title: Gene list --> Intra-set BIOGRID and iRefIndex PHYSICAL Interactions

query.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Physical_Both
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Give a list of genes, retrieve all physical interactions between them from the BIOGRID and iRefIndex database
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D) and (E or F)

query.name: Gene_Ortholog_Conversion
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, convert it/them to its/their orthologs.

query.name: PubChem_Protein
query.longDescription: Given a PubChem compound or a list of PubChem compounds find all know target proteins (BioAssay and STITCH).

template.name: Gene_Protein_Phosphorylation_Kinase
template.title: Gene(s) --> Phosphorylation sites and catalyzed kinase

query.name: Gene_Protein_Phosphorylation_Kinase
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.modifications.residue Gene.proteins.modifications.position Gene.proteins.modifications.relations.gene1.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.modifications.relations.gene1.symbol
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, show all phosphorylation sites (protein resides) and the catalyzed kinase.

query.name: Gene_HCDP_Tissue_Spec
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.name Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.gene2.name Gene.interactions.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve HCDPs where the interacting genes are highly expressed in specific tissues and/or cell types.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Protein_Structure_Drug
template.title: Protein(s) --> PDB entries with approved drugs

query.name: Protein_Structure_Drug
query.longDescription: Given a list of proteins, show all the approved drugs solved in complex with any structure of these proteins if present.

query.name: Gene_BioGrid_SP
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all species-specific interactions from the BIOGRID database

query.name: Gene_Disease_Compound_Structure
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, identify all the diseases which they are associated with and all the drugs which target these genes and the 3D structure of the complex has been resolved.

query.name: Gene_MiRNA_SpSpec
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find the miRNAs of a specific species which target these gene(s). (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: ProteinDomain_Gene
query.longDescription: For given protein domain, list all genes which could translate to the protein containing this domain.

template.name: Gene_RelationTypeSet_Upstream
template.title: Gene(s) + Relation type set --> Upstream gene(s)

query.name: Gene_RelationTypeSet_Upstream
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.text Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name Gene.relations.pathways.identifier
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes and a specific set of the relation types, find all upstream genes and the related pathways.

template.name: Gene_HC_Interaction
template.title: Gene(s) --> High confidence (HC) or high confidence direct physical (HCDP) PPIs

query.name: Gene_HC_Interaction
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.gene2.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.confidences.type
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find all high confident or high confident direct physical interacting partners (within same species).

constraint.description: HC: high confidence; HCDP: high confidence direct physical

query.name: Drug_ActionType_Protein
query.longDescription: Given a drug compound or a list of drug compounds, find all target proteins for a specific action type (agonist, inhibitor and so on).

template.name: Gene_Gene3D
template.title: Gene(s) --> Protein(s) --> Gene3D CATH classification annotations

query.name: Gene_Gene3D
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find the corresponding proteins and list all structural domains (CATH) assigned by Gene3D.

template.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Both
template.title: Gene list --> Intra-set BIOGRID and iRefIndex Interactions

query.name: Gene_BioGrid_n_iRef_Both
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Give a list of genes, retrieve all interactions between them from the BIOGRID and iRefIndex database
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D)

query.name: Protein_Modifications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.organism.name Protein.modifications.type Protein.modifications.position Protein.modifications.residue
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, find all known post translational modifications.

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find all GO annotations.

template.name: Gene_allGOTerms
template.title: Gene --> GO terms and parents of those terms.

query.name: Gene_allGOTerms
query.longDescription: Given a gene show the associated GO terms, and the all parents to the top of the directed graph.

template.name: Gene_MiRNA_HC
template.title: Gene --> High confidence functional upstream miRNA(s)

query.name: Gene_MiRNA_HC
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all high confidence functional miRNAs which target the genes. (Data source: miRTarBase)

query.name: Protein_PDB
query.longDescription: Retrieve all PDB structures for a protein or a list of proteins.

query.name: Gene_RelationType
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.types.name Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name Gene.relations.pathways.identifier Gene.relations.pathways.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes and the relation type, find all reacted genes and the source pathways.

query.name: Gene_Interaction_SourceDB
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.sources.sourceDb
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all interactions from a specific data source. May contain cross species interactions.

query.name: Gene_Specific_Orthologues
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all orthologous genes of a specific species.

query.name: Protein_Gene
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, find the corresponding gene(s).

query.name: JSCC_DrugCompound
query.longDescription:
Given a JSCC code, find all drug compounds (from DrugBank or KEGG Drug) assigned with this classification.
NOTE: Use asterisk symbol (*) for the higher level code (see the example).

query.name: Gene_Orthologues
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, retrieve all orthologous genes.

query.name: Gene_RelationType_Target
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.text Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes and the relation type, find all Downstream genes and the source pathways. (to be refined)

query.name: CG_DrugBank_wo_substrate
query.longDescription: Given a compound group or a list of compound group, find all target proteins reported in DrugBank excluding those acted as the 'substrate'.

template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel. Removed tags so no longer displayed - just used for quick search now. Rachel.

query.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
query.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.

query.name: Protein_GOSlim
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Protein.organism.name Protein.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.identifier Protein.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.name Protein.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.namespace
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, find all GOSlim annotations.

query.name: CompoundGroup_TargetProtein
query.longDescription: Given a compound group or a list of compound group, find all target proteins.

query.name: Gene_GOSlim
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.name Gene.goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.namespace
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes, find all GO Slim annotations.

query.name: CATH_Protein
query.longDescription: Given a CATH node, find all proteins which are assigned with this structural domain by Gene3D.

query.name: Gene_Relation
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.types.name Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of gene, find the relations the gene involved in. (to be refined)

query.name: Homologue_Query
query.longDescription: Find homologous genes among human, rat and mouse.

template.name: Gene_RelationTypeSet
template.title: Gene(s) + Relation type set --> Downstream gene(s)

query.name: Gene_RelationTypeSet
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.relations.text Gene.relations.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.relations.gene2.symbol Gene.relations.gene2.organism.name Gene.relations.pathways.identifier
query.longDescription: Given a gene or a list of genes and a specific set of the relation types, find all downstream genes and the related pathways.

query.name: Protein_Bioactivity
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, show the compounds which target the protein(s) with known bioactivities (IC50, Kd and Ki by the unit nM).

template.name: Protein_Namespace_GOterms
template.title: Protein(s) --> GO terms of a specific name space

query.name: Protein_Namespace_GOterms
query.longDescription: GIveb a protein or a list of proteins, find the GO annotations in a specific name space (biological_process, cellular_component or molecular_function).

query.name: UniprotType_Protein
query.view: Protein.features.type Protein.features.start Protein.features.end Protein.features.description Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.organism.name
query.longDescription: Given an UniProt feature type, find all proteins of a specific species that contain this feature.

query.name: CATH_Druggability
query.longDescription:
Given a CATH Homologous Superfamily code, find the druggability of known protein structures within the same superfamily.
NOTE: You can use the Protein --> Gene3D template first to identify the CATH superfamily, then run this template to check the druggabilities.

query.name: Drug_JSCCCodes
query.longDescription: Given a drug or a list of drugs, retrieve the corresponding classification of Japan Standard Commodity Classification (JSCC).

query.name: EFO_GWAS_Gene
query.longDescription: Given an EFO term or al list of EFO terms, find the associated genes from the genome wide association studies.

query.name: EFO_GWAS_Gene_Pathway
query.longDescription: Given an EFO term or al list of EFO terms, find the pathways of the associated genes from the genome wide association studies.

query.name: Enzyme_Gene_Ontology
query.longDescription: For given enzymes, show the Gene Ontology (GO) terms of a specific name space.

query.name: Enzyme_PDB
query.longDescription: Retrieve PDB entries for an enzyme or a list of enzymes.

template.name: GOtermidentifier_name
template.title: GO term identifier --> GO term name.

query.name: GOtermidentifier_name
query.longDescription: Give the GO term name for a particular GO term identifier. (Data Source: GO)

template.name: GOname_GOidentifier
template.title: GO term name --> GO term identifier.

query.name: GOname_GOidentifier
query.longDescription: Find the GO identifier for a specific term.

template.name: Gene_particularGoannotation
template.title: Gene + GO term name --> Gene with the GO term name.

query.name: Gene_particularGoannotation
query.longDescription: Show if the following gene has the following GO term.

query.name: Gene_info
query.longDescription: Display general information for a gene.

query.name: ProbeSet_Ortholog
query.longDescription: Given a probe set ID (Affymetrix ) or a list of probe set IDs, convert to the orthologus probes of the specific species. The query probe is converted to gene then orthologus gene then to the probe(s).

query.name: Protein_GOterms
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular protein.

template.name: Protein_ProteinDomain
template.title: Protein --> Protein Domains in the specified database

query.name: Protein_ProteinDomain
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.proteinDomainRegions.originalDb Protein.proteinDomainRegions.originalId Protein.proteinDomainRegions.start Protein.proteinDomainRegions.end Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.name
query.longDescription: For given protein(s), list all domains in the specified database.

template.name: Protein_DNA_ProteinStructure
template.title: Protein --> Protein structures co-crystalized with DNA

query.name: Protein_DNA_ProteinStructure
query.longDescription: Given a protein or a list of proteins, give me all the protein structures that have been co-crystalized with DNA.

query.name: ProteinDomain_Protein
query.longDescription: For given protein domain, list all proteins which contain this domain.

query.name: ProteinRegion_UniprotFeature
query.longDescription: Given a protein and a region of the protein, list all known features in this region.

query.name: Protein_Gene3D
query.longDescription:
Given a protein or a list of proteins, list all structural domains (CATH) assigned by Gene3D.
NOTE: You can run this template followed by the CATH Homologous Superfamily --> Druggability template to check the druggabilities of those domains.
